meanings.sent1: The sciurid creatures in the park were busy gathering nuts for winter.
meanings.sent2: The sciurid behavior of the squirrel indicated its natural instincts.
meanings.sent3: The sciurid antics of the squirrel entertained the children at the playground.
meanings.sent4: Her sciurid curiosity led her to observe the squirrel's movements closely.
meanings.sent5: The sciurid characteristics of the squirrel made it easily recognizable among other animals.

meanings.definition: A member of the squirrel family
meanings.sent1: The sciurid scurried up the tree with lightning speed.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a sciurid nibbling on a nut near the park bench.
meanings.sent3: The sciurid chattered away happily in the tree canopy.
meanings.sent4: The sciurid's fluffy tail stood out against the green leaves.
meanings.sent5: A sciurid's agility in climbing trees is truly impressive to watch.
